content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday, july 22, 2014, at 8:45 pm, a ufo photographed on the island of poros, escorts a passenger plane. the incident captured with the camera of ufo researcher harris koutsiaftis which at that time was from the southwest side of the main city. the two objects (where flying at high altitude) was shining, thanks to the reflection of the sun on them. available in 30-40 seconds remained visible in the visual field of the researcher. those seconds the unknown object was moving parallel to the plane, then began to overtake them and in the ends flies in front of the nose of the airplane at a greater distance, until it lost both skyline . at the time of the photographs, dozens of people around began to realize what was happening and looked up in the sky observing and commenting on the paradox of the case. 
analyzing the incident harris, said the identity of shiny objects: "there is no known conventional military aircraft to fly with such speed, to reflect sunlight and it not after exhaust! so we talk, or an alien flying saucer, or a secret human aircraft, there escort the plane after the incessant crashes occurring in the last days."
in a further statement, harris, excluded also the case of a reflection of a plane in icy cloud crystals, not only because of july and the clear skies of that evening, but also because the strange glow was not after the sun but between him and the object.
more, for the strange passage through the next issue of greek ufo magazine named "et" and the september issue of greek "phenomena".
content.summary: Ufo escorts an airplane over poros island, at greece!

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside conversing with a friend when we noticed two small pulsating/flickering orbs with organic characteristics appear in the sky behind tree cover. upon further inspection, these two were followed by a grouping of three more orbs, then four more, with an estimated 4-8 more of varying groupings following behind the original 'convoy'. these orbs were flying over a regional airport coming in from the south with no sound whatsoever. they made a directional fly in from the south (long island sound), flying northeast, then finally diagonally up out of the atmosphere until they were too high to observe (imagine an elongated check mark trajectory) it appeared that these objects changed course and then exited the atmosphere. these objects appeared to have no discernible surface, however showed an organic quality much like a distant flame hovering through the skies, instead of an apparent source of the light they were giving off. the shapes were spherical in nature, but again were not very detailed at all, again having a very organic flame-like nature.

this sighting was also observed by a motorist who promptly stopped at the midway point of the sighting. we all agreed that these looked too odd to be planes.

being that this was a small regional airport, roughly five minutes before the sighting, a helicopter (unknown size/markings) took off to the southeast. it's very common to observe air traffic in this area.
content.summary: 12-15 glowing pulsated orbs observed passing over airport

content.detailedDescription:
On july 27th, 2014, at approximately 9:20 pm, i was photographing a lightning storm that was coming through the montgomery county/clarksville, tn area. during my photography of this storm, i captured an object in several of my pictures that i could not identify. this object was not discovered until the next day (7/28/14)when i began reviewing and editing my pictures.

while looking at my pictures, i kept noticing a star like object directly in the center of several of the pictures. initially, i believed this to be nothing more than a bright star, dust, or something on the lens of the camera. upon further examination of the pictures (zooming in), i discovered that the object in one of the pictures was star like, but in the other pictures, it is more disc shaped (looking from the side).

being a reasonable individual, i kept looking at these pictures and perhaps, at first, the object could have been plane or helicopter...Or something from ft. campbell, but during the time the object was there (in all the pictures it is in) it stayed in the same location (position) and did not move. still being reasonable and looking for another explanation, perhaps the object was a satellite or the international space station. but the object seems to be below the clouds that appear in the pictures. but, after looking at some of my other pictures, the object no longer appears in any of them, only during a certain period of time. there very well could be some other reasonable explanation, but, i do not see what it could be at this time. upon zooming in on the object (shown in the pictures), the object is of no design i have ever seen before (but i am in no way part of aviation or the military any more).

as stated, the object hovered, and stationary in the pictures and after approximately 20 minutes, the object is gone.
content.summary: Photographed during lightningn storm, in distance, south of the clarksville, tn area.

content.detailedDescription:
1.W alking in town center between 10-11:30 pm
2.Fast light moving on sky watched because it was a possible rainy day
3.I was thinking is a fast light projected from ground
4. cloud like shape object moving fast  and disappearing after 2-4 seconds, with random mouvements, mainly straight but in different location on sky.Colour of night sky seems to change in the area.
5.It feels like we are monitored by an unknown  entity.
6.Object seems to appear and disappear in different sky location, randomly.
content.summary: Cloud like shape hovering the night sky, and different reflected colour of sky clouds

content.detailedDescription: About 1 am i took my dog out to pee.  she ran off, and my neighbors dog who is in a pen started whimpering.  i got nervous thinking there might be an animal in the woods.  next thing i know there is a silvery, blue disk shape right above my neighbors roof.  only way for me to describe it was it looked like energy.  it wasn't solid, but not translucent either.  i wasn't sure what i was seeing whether it was from this universe, or spiritual.  if i wasn't paralyzed from fear i would have enjoyed it's beauty more.  within 5 or so seconds it dispersed?  i felt the energy go through my body.  i honestly didn't know for a few minutes if i was dead, or alive.  i didn't feel any pain, just warmth.  logically i thought maybe i had somehow got struck by lightening.  it looked nothing like lightening though, and i had no pain, burns, anything outwardly different at all that i could tell.  i remember saying "what the heck was that?"  a few moments later i saw it up higher and farther away.  i never saw it move from point a to point b though.  after it took off?  it was out of sight till i saw it reappear those few moments later.  i would describe the size the first time i saw it as around the size of the diameter of our above ground pool.  so around 20-24 feet.  that's an estimate.  i was closer to the ground than it was, but saw it from the side, not underneath.  i saw no craft, only the blue energy.
content.summary: Large blue mass of energy? appeared.  upon it disappearing? i felt a wave of energy/radiation travel through my body.  reappeared higher, and farther in the sky about 20 seconds later.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were swimming last night between 10:30 and 11 pm. we were star gazing and he pointed out the object in question. we both witnessed a glowing orb-like object flying northwest in the night sky. about 5 minutes after we saw the object, it hovered and ejected something northward before continuing northwest again. it emitted a strange light that increased in intensity twice before dimming back. it was much higher than an airplane would be, as an airplane flew by about 10 minutes later and we compared what we had seen to the airplane flight. after about 10 minutes, we lost sight of the object behind cloud coverage. we were both in awe. i admit that for the hour or so following the sighting, i felt very strange in an almost melancholic mood followed by a headache before going to sleep.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing orb-like object flying very high in the night sky, stopped and ejected something north of it, then continued north west direction until we lost it behind the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on top of a nearby mountain watching the delta aquariid meteor shower.

then out of nowhere a massive ball of comet-like light appeared in the distance. 

initially we thought it might be a fireball of some sort related to the shower.

then the object began to fan out in a slightly diagonal formation as the lights broke off from the original source. then as a group the lights changed course and direction which resulted in a slight decrease in the intensity of the light and then appeared to patrol nearby mountains. eventually one of the objects could be seen coming straight at us! 

the object then flew directly overhead a few hundred feet above us at least. accompanied with it was a strange roaring sound slightly similar to that of a jet plane. i recall a shape that seemed slightly like a three-dimensional octagon with a red triangle of light on its side.

my feelings associated with the object was of surprise, amazement, and awe. i had no doubt it was something extremely alien to me. and i had the strange sensation that it was "reading" my thoughts as it's movement seemed to reflect my feelings of it. i should also note that time seemed to slow down incredibly.

i lost sight of the group of lights as they disappeared behind a group of mountains in the distance. as for the single object that flew directly over head this object disappeared beyond the horizon of mountains in the opposite directions (due east) of its companions.
content.summary: Massive fireball that appeared to be comet-like broke off into a handful of smaller lights then circled around and disappeared beyond horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house when she noticed a light in the sky. when i looks the light was bigger then a star and was emanating white, red, amber, and green lights. the white, green, and red lights were bright and the amber light was dim. at first i thought it was a helicopter hovering and using a spot light but did not hear anything. i have worked on helicopters and know the sounds they make and from the distance the object was i should have heard the engines and blades. after realizing it wasn't a helicopter i started to record the object. i recorded the object for 4 mins 31 seconds. i was distracted by my friend and when i looked back it was gone.
content.summary: Orb like hovering over the airport

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my fiance in williamsport, pa and we were walking home with a pizza when i noticed a prominent reddish-orange object to the north.  i thought it was a plane on approach to the regional airport, but it was pulsating irregularly and didn't seem to be moving.  i stood so that a telephone pole was in the foreground, giving me a point of reference, and it indeed was not moving.  as i alerted my fiance to the sight, it started drifting slowly to the left (west), crossing behind the telephone pole (distance behind pole is unknown), then changed directions towards the north.  this was not a slow, wide change as a plane would make, but sudden, sharp (yet smooth) directional changes.  as it was drifting to the north, it abruptly disappeared, and we did not see it again.

i am positive this object was not a plane, as, while it was not large, it was large enough that, if an incoming plane, it would have been low and therefore would be making noise, which this object did not.  also, as it charged directions, the amount of light emitted did not change, as it would with a banking plane; additionally, the light was pulsating irregularly and was a reddish-orange, uncommon for planes.  besides that, the object was hovering in place when we first spotted it, which was determined by the placement of the above mentioned telephone pole in my field of vision for a point of reference.  

in an attempt to identify the object, it may have been a type of chinese lantern, as it seemed to hover and change directions in the way i've seen these lanterns behave; however, chinese lanterns usually have companions, and this light was solitary.  i am sure it wasn't a plane, helicopter, or drone of any kind, but beyond the thought of it being a chinese lantern, i can't say exactly what it was besides a ufo.
content.summary: Floating, pulsating orb that hovered, changed directions sharply, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: On saturday night my husband, nephew and i were on our deck in las cruces stargazing.  my husband was the first to notice a flurry of several dim objects that turned into a v formation. he stated they were at first moving beyond the parameters of any known human aerial craft.  as soon as he pointed the flurry out my nephew and i looked to that direction in which we spotted a very large, dimly lit formation that appeared to be flying very high and very fast without any sound.  the v formation started north of las cruces and flew towards el paso. again it seemed very high and it only took a few seconds for it to fly over our heads.  my husband is the only witness to the flurry of the objects before they formed up into a v, but we all clearly witnessed the flying v. the lights were faint but visible, if i had to guess how many made up the v i would say between 8-12 total.
content.summary: Flying v formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back deck observing the sky/stars/planets. specifically, looking for the andromeda galaxy.

i noticed the object because it appeared as a flame pulsating in the sky. when i used my binoculars (bushnell h2o series 8x42) the flame was more an orange reddish aura with a super bright orange center.

i thought mabye it's a helicopter or plane equipped with a weird light.

the first object traveled from the north portland area going e/se in a lateral direction. the next two traveled from the north portland area going e/se. one of the two in lead sped up then slowed down. then the other sped up and slowed down to catch up to the first one. the two seemed to fly in formation.

my feelings were what the heck was that on the first one. then oh well. then the next two my feelings were what the heck are those? aircraft/helicopter i don't know. i used my binoculars to get a closer look and still could not tell what the objects were. flares, no. balloons, no. i don't know. when they were gone i continued to observe for my original target in andromeda.

lost sight when objects disappeared from my sight line in sky as they continued e/se.
content.summary: I observed a flame like object/orb in sky. it traveled east/se. then about 8 min later two more. variable speeds.

content.detailedDescription: I work for a local radio station.  this morning one of our local listeners,   called to tell me about one of his calves.  he checks his cattle every day and the other day one of his calves were missing from the herd.  he couldn't find it that day but the next day he noticed a buzzered and went to that area and found the calf in a creek bed.  all the internal organs were gone, it was drained of all blood and there was nothing left but hide and bones.  he said, there was a smell like a butcher shop has.  he moved all his herd to another area and has sold all the calves he could as he heard that his neighbor has lost 15 calves the same way this calf has died.  i asked him to contact the neighbor and get back with me.  i thought you might want to check this out.
content.summary: Cattle mutilation

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the train, which stopped in falaknuma palace railway station. i looking at falaknuma palace on the hill, in the city of hyderabad, and took 2 pictures of the palace from the train window in a span of 5 seconds using my samsung mobile phone. train was static. then the train moved after it got signal.

i didnot check the pictures nor did i notice the ufo in the pictures for some time. then after a month, while downloading the pictures i observed that in the first picture taken at 21 seconds past 1809 hrs (21 seconds past 06-09 pm)there was a ufo, which was missing in the next picture taken after 5 seconds.

the palace which i wanted to take a picture of is located near the international airport. for some time i thought it was an airplane. but i took the picture of the palace after noticing that the sky is clear, and no airplanes flying that time.

secondly, i felt that no airplane can move so fast within a span of 5 seconds gap between 2 photos, at an altitude where a plane can either land or take off.

i, hereby, present both the pictures for your evaluation

pic-1 : file name : 2013-09-27 18.09.21
pic-2 : file name : 2013-09-27 18.09.26

both the names of the files are system generated and you can find the date & time (in seconds) in the file names.
content.summary: Ufo observed in 1 of 2 still photos taken in 5 seconds gap

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch having a cigarette at 11:00 pm on july 21, 2014.
when in the sky, well above the tree line in the direction of dallas g.A.
i spotted an orange ,almost amber in color bright light, in the shape of a ball. it seemed to be scanning the air and ground. it emited a yellow light in the form of a beam/ray. i immediately ran into the house to get my binoculars. when i rushed back out, it had phased out behind the clouds.
i waited a few moments and sure enough it phased back into sight. with excitement i watched as it scanned more of the air and ground. this occurred for nearly 45 min's. as it seemingly sat in the same general area.
once it finished what it was doing, it began to move north , northeast toward woodstock g.A. but in doing so it changed form and color. it became round and saucer shaped instead of ball shaped. the colors went away aswell. the object was tilted forward and had begun to pulse lights of white, blue and green down the side's. it was spinning while moving forward with these lights going in order all the way around it. it traveled very fast and was soon out of my view. i felt energized and full of excitement because i knew it hadn't been a plane, or helicopter. i see those regularly and can easily identify them day or night. i knew i had experienced something special. oddly enough my neighbor across from me had seen something similar in the night sky on a separate night and informed me after i told him what i had seen. leading me to believe that whatever this was, may just return some night in the near future. if it does, this time i will record it if at all possible. but i can definatly describe and sketch this object for i believe it has burned the image into my memory for the rest of my life.
content.summary: Amazing and unique sight to see

content.detailedDescription: Appx 2:15am i observed a light in the sky towards the nnw that would change color and move about the sky in only that part of the sky. it would move to left, stop, then move downward, then move left, up, etc. it would move randomly in all directions. i strongly observed it for about 10 mins. then periodically checked over the next 20 mins and it was still there but higher up in the sky and dimmer last i saw it. i also seen 2 shooting stars while observing the object. at first i thought it was a plane until it stopped and moved downward and then changed direction. it stayed in just that particular area of the sky. it would change colors from red to a bluish-white randomly. after all the years studying the paranormal this is the first time i have ever witnessed something like this. i would not report this if i knew an explanation but this thing changed direction, sped up and sped down, and completely stopped so many times that there is no explanation. this area does not fit the criteria for a ufo hot spot at all and all the years i've lived in this area i have never witnessed something like this at all.
content.summary: Star-like light moving around in the sky. left,right, up, and down

content.detailedDescription: Two craft descended from 1000f when first seen, craft 2 hovered at 500f, craft 1 hovered 30f above water then emitted beam of light about 15f across into water then a seal was levitated out of water into the craft,an turned off and both craft moved position . craft 2 left at high speed in less than a second it was a star then blinked out, craft 1 came within 500f of me in a direct line,i had the feeling it new it was being watched by me, it hovered in position for 20 seconds, i was able to asses and calculate many thing in this time like size,field it was generating and so on,much more detail i can give when my calculations are complete.....Don't know what more to tell you, but would like to talk with you face to face then i can give you full second by second details of the event.All this was seen on a still and very clear night, and i have excellent vision, and have a science and physics background also a marine biologist...If this help, i can give a full annalise at a later date.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 craft desended over water one hoverd then emitted beam and lifted seal out of water into craft 1, then they left area

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen a star like structure in the sky when i was cycling and it is like egg shaped. changing direction in the sky. 
as i've experienced it for first time, i think it should be a star.
but on next day i read it in newspapers that at last evening, a ufo seen in my city. at that i got surprised, that i've really seen a ufo in the sky...
and it is a very ossom  moment for me..
and because of this, i am sharing my story.

images taken from another eye witness source..
content.summary: For first time i have seen ufo in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: On 7/27/14 i witnessed what appeared to be flashing and pulsing star like lights that would move rapidly in various directions. some lights would flash and disappear and reappear.They were bright white lights with a grey tone at times but always pulsing and moving. i went inside and used a simple led flashlight and would turn it on and off in groups or 3 and four and appeared to get a flash of light in that format. they seemed to almost be a fleet entering the atmosphere.The duration lasted about 5 minutes give or take and they appeared to be at very high elevation. during the sighting i had a very uneasy feeling as though i was being watched...But nothing was seen. i am certain this was not a plane. i took many pictures with my cell phone. this occurred in tulsa oklahoma.
content.summary: Star like flashing and pulsing lights that moved rapidly in different directions

content.detailedDescription: Strange star like shapes and flashes occurred in tulsa oklahoma on 07/27/14. there were about six or more star shaped lights moving rapidly in different directions.  the would pulse and flash rapidly. i used an led light and flashed back at the lights which then appeared to flash back the same number of times. the appeared to be a mile or so in elevation and made no noise. many would disappear and reappear at fast rates. i felt as though i was being watched while this occurred and felt fearful. i felt like it was a possible large fleet entering the atmosphere.
content.summary: Multiple flashing star like lights that changed direction rapidly and would blink and glow

content.detailedDescription:
Out in the back yard. saw what i thought were balloons released in the air from nw direction (from the beach). then i noticed that the "balloons" were moving with purpose. they stayed together.... unlike balloons which ascend and move with the wind.... some glided smoothly in a se direction, while others seem to zig zag... but still staying within the group of orbs. 

once the orbs got over the house .... the orbs stopped gliding, and seem to stay stationary over the house for about 10 seconds.... then they ascended straight up passed the clouds.

four witnesses.... and 3 others that were not able to see as it was at night and their vision is not 20/20.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 20-50 white orbs flying over the los angeles bay area

content.detailedDescription: On 27 july at approx. 2230. i had gone oitside to have a smoke. as i was standing in my driveway i saw something out of the corner of my eye, i glanced towards in (westerly) and noted a bright gold colored something. light or glow was very steady with no noted flickering or pulsing lights. the object traveled from the west to the se at a steady velocity. it did appear to move up and down slightly. as it moved out of sight behind the trees, i noticed a group of about 5-6 of the same types of lights. all headed in the same direction. as i saw these i ran inside to get my camera. as i turned on the camera, it recorded about three seconds of me tracking to find it then camera went dead. after objects went out of sight camera began working again. in total i watched these light for about 10 minutes. about 2-3 minutes after i lost sight of them behind the tress i could hear a helicopter in the distance, but there is a hospital in the area with a heli pad. when i first noticed the first object there were some fire works being set off but these fireworks were north of me, the objects were south of me. no sound was noted during the incident whatsoever, even the neighborhood dogs were silent.
content.summary: Bright glowing objects gold in color

content.detailedDescription: It was a very warm night when i seen the ufo.It was stay in one place, then left
content.summary: It was round flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside and i noticed a jet heading west flying low and pretty loud with wing lights and a flashing tail light, i then see another craft fly over the jet heading north the second craft was silent or atleast i couldn't hear any sound other then the jet heading west.

the second craft was tri-angler in shape and had 3 solid lights one at the front and two on the lower sides.

at first i thought it was another jet but i noticed the sound of the jet was coming from the first craft heading west, as the second craft flew north i couldn't hear another sound, just sounded like there was one craft in the air but two were visible, it also seemed odd to me that they would cross paths the tri-angle flew over the jet (or the jet flew under the tri-angle)
content.summary: Black triangle with solid lights

content.detailedDescription: I was talking on the phone,looking out at the soon-to-be sunset through a window. i noticed what i thought to be a plane with a vapor trail,but the object did not seem to be a plane,for it moved painfully slow and the object seemed to be one solid body;not a plane with a vapor trail. as i observed this object,i called some friends in the house to come look out at this object. the group of friends were quite perplexed, and about a minute or two went by and i observed another identical object without telling them, as my friends had gone back to watching t.V. as the second object went by, i began to feel fear in the pit of my stomach. the second object moved very much like the first.Then, a couple of minutes went by and a third object,moving vertical( the first two were moving horizontal) and very slow,changing direction abrubtly,eventually. this direction change is impossible with my understanding of conventional aircraft,and the third object appeared more obvious as a disc than the first two,but seeing these objects in succession leads me to believe that they were all from the same origin or same shape. as the last observed object was within my perception,i called to one of my friends again and he and i saw this object fade and disappear, unlike the first two. we were watching this third object and it just vanished!! i felt a bit (and still) sick to my stomach about this sighting.
content.summary: Observed 3 disc type objects,one disappearing as it went straight after changing direction

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing then noticed this strange ufo it hovered mostly blinking white/blue light. there was a total of 3 which 2 sped off very quickly. i then noticed 2 red/orange dots leave the the one that hovered. the 2 orange ufos flew erratically away. i watched the primary ufo ascend out of atmosphere,  in a straight path and with a slight white trail. as it left atmosphere it turned blue. also witnessed exact same thing following night  7/27/2014.
content.summary: Ufo was hovering moving slightly then there were 3 of them that sped off 1 remained hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing then noticed this strange ufo it hovered mostly blinking white/blue light. there was a total of 3 which 2 sped off very quickly. i then noticed 2 red/orange dots leave the the one that hovered. the 2 orange ufos flew erratically away. i watched the primary ufo ascend out of atmosphere,  in a straight path and with a slight white trail. as it left atmosphere it turned blue. also witnessed exact same thing following night  7/27/2014.
content.summary: Ufo was hovering moving slightly then there were 3 of them that sped off 1 remained hovering

content.detailedDescription: There is a video on yutube
content.summary: One stanionary whine with a line of muti colored coming out the back

content.detailedDescription: My friend i and were driving on the road from padova to cittadella, around limena. we spotted a couple of disc shaped objects hovering high in the clear night sky, a colored glowing one chasing a white one. the colored one's surface was glowing in different colors. the other one had a white color and a more rounded shape. then we saw a massive group of lights in front of them: we still cant say if it was a massive fleet of single objects or a one bug object made of hundreds of colored lights. we could nit see any shape, too dark in the sky, no moon or other known objects as a reference. a couple of other guys stopped their car behind us and witnessed the entire phenomenon with us. no picture taken, i took a video with my crappy blackberry but nothing visible. the sight lasted about 20 mins, the the fleet all together moved up slowly and we believe it disappeared over the clouds.
content.summary: 2 disc shaped objects, glowing multicolor lighted, chase each other and following a massive fleet

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and my grandson and i went out fishing was taking photo's and did not see anything.

it was not till we flew back to my brothers camp and was uploading the pictures from my camera that i noticed the object in the photo.

it is the only picture that i have and maybe it can be explained.
content.summary: Just a picture i took out fishing with my brother and grandson

content.detailedDescription:
Was up before 5 am sitting on my porch. an amazingly fast moving satellite moved from right to left low in the east .. went across the pleiades at 4:50 am exact time .. low brightness almost dull and that color did not change with 1. its position in the sky or 2. the sun being just below the eastern horizon. 

it must have had some sort of surface that filtered out most reflections.
the orbit was lower than most and the speed far greater than the original plodding space shots. i dubbed this one "jack the ripper."

could this be a one orbit and "land/blow up" .. "special drop able hardware package" .. sneak info gathering space shot? if so was it ours .. across america in the dark .. taking pictures else where .. asia?

on the 24th i had a night time view of the milky way superior to anything in my life for clarity .. clouds of stars .. a trail .. and smaller clouds of stars .. etc. .. thin trails and masses.

about 15 minutes prior to the above .. 4:35 am .. i saw a regular old fashioned satellite .. s to n .. go over at my zenith .. directly overhead. like, i saw the old and the new in one night.
content.summary: The fastest satellite i have ever seen
